00103             function                skip_call_params_validation( $Value )
00104             {
00105                   global                  $SkipCallParamsValidation;
00106                   
00107                   $SkipCallParamsValidation = $Value;
00108             }

00136             function                process_object_line( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00137             {
00138                   try
00139                   {
00140                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'object_line' ) ; )
00141                         {
00142                               $this->MacroSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00143                               $this->MacroSettings->set_undefined( 'header' , 'object_line_header.tpl' );
00144                               $this->MacroSettings->set_undefined( 'footer' , 'object_line_footer.tpl' );
00145                               
00146                               $PackageName = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00147                               $PackageVersion = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00148                               $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00149                               
00150                               $this->skip_call_params_validation( true );
00151                               $Code = $Package->view( $this->MacroSettings );
00152                               $this->skip_call_params_validation( false );
00153                               
00154                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{object_line:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00155                               $Changed = true;
00156                         }
00157                         
00158                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00159                   }
00160                   catch( Exception $e )
00161                   {
00162                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00163                   }
00164             }
00165             
00196             function                process_options( $Options , $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00197             {
00198                   try
00199                   {
00200                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'options' ) ; )
00201                         {
00202                               $this->MacroSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00203                               $Name = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00204                               $Value = $Options->get_setting( $Name , '' );
00205                               
00206                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{options:$MacroParameters}" , $Value , $ProcessingString );
00207                               $Changed = true;
00208                         }
00209                         
00210                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00211                   }
00212                   catch( Exception $e )
00213                   {
00214                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00215                   }
00216             }
